# MPL

## qsort
two approaches implemented, with random choice of element to sort in array (comparably slow), and one-liner with list comprehension.

Example:
```python
enter the set of numbers to sort:2 9 1 5 8 0 3
random-wise approach [0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 9] and time res: 9.299999999999933e-05
list comprehension approach [0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 9] and time res: 5.199999999999996e-05
```
## spiral matrix generator
Just simply input the dimensions, rows and columns respectively.
```python
enter the dimensions of the matrix:5 4
1 2 3 4
14 15 16 5
13 20 17 6
12 19 18 7
11 10 9 8
```
## Text keys parser

Pretty dumb approach, but still
Enter the phrase and directory to search (if not, will search in the default one)
```python
Enter a phrase to search for:а не
and directory to search (optional):
['а', 'не']
```
